TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DesignerTransaction extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class DesignerTransaction Implements IDisposable
public ref class DesignerTransaction abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供方式，用於群組一系列設計階段動作以改善效能，以及啟用大部分變更類型以復原。

span.span: Provides a way to group a series of design-time actions to improve performance and enable most types of changes to be undone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交易可以追蹤稍後可以復原的動作。Transactions can track actions that can be undone later. 藉由取消交易，會自動嘗試將每個已變更的屬性設定為其變更前的值來還原每個變更，便可反轉交易期間所做的變更。Changes made during a transaction can be reversed by canceling a transaction, which automatically attempts to reverse each change by setting each changed property to its pre-change value. 交易也可以將一系列的作業期間的效能改善可以延遲顯示更新，直到交易完成為止。Transactions can also improve performance during a series of operations by deferring updates to the display until the completion of the transaction. 當交易正在進行中時，某些元件延遲其處理，直到交易完成透過接聽和事件。When a transaction is in progress, some components defer their processing until the transaction has completed by listening to the and events. [屬性] 視窗中，例如，不會更新它的顯示畫面直到異動關閉開啟的交易之後。The Properties window, for example, does not update its display after a transaction has opened until the transaction has closed. 若要使用的交易復原或多個作業，已建立您的設計工具針對每個作業或系列的作業，這應該是可復原。To use transactions for reversible or multiple operations, have your designer create a for each operation or series of operations which should be reversible. 請小心，不要執行動作可能會讓復原事件序列無法順利完成的交易之外。Be careful not to perform actions outside the transactions that might prevent a sequence of undo events from completing successfully. 您可以取得新藉由呼叫方法。You can obtain a new by calling the method of an . 請務必取得每個從作用中才能正確處理機制，而不是建立新的設計工具異動與整合直接。Be sure to obtain each from the active in order to correctly integrate with the designer transaction processing mechanism, rather than creating a new directly. 若要執行的動作，在交易中，您必須先建立交易。To perform an action within a transaction, you must first create a transaction. 您必須呼叫方法之前發生每個變更或一組變更，而方法在每個變更或一組變更之後發生。Then you must call the method before each change or set of changes occurs, and the method after each change or set of changes occur. 最後，完成，並藉由呼叫關閉交易方法。Finally, complete and close the transaction by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 當變更屬性值，使用方法，呼叫的元件變更方法並建立自動表示變更。When making changes to property values, use the method of a , which calls the component change methods of the and creates a representing the change automatically. 若要執行的交易，請完成下列步驟：To perform a transaction, complete the following steps: 1. 呼叫取得，可以用來控制交易。Call to obtain a that can be used to control the transaction. 2. 內`try`區塊中的，針對您想要追蹤與每個動作，呼叫方法，進行變更或變更，然後呼叫方法來通知有已進行變更。Within a `try` block, for each action that you want to track with a , call the method, make the change or changes, then call the method to signal that the change or changes have been made. 3. 若要完成交易，呼叫從`finally`區塊。To complete the transaction, call from within a `finally` block. 在 C# 中，您可以使用`using`陳述式而非`try/finally`區塊，如下列範例所示。In C#, you can use the `using` statement rather than a `try/finally` block, such as in the following example. ``` using (host.CreateTransaction() { // Insert your code here. } ``` 若要取消，並嘗試回復的交易已認可之前，請呼叫方法。To cancel and attempt to roll back a transaction before it has been committed, call the method. 當叫用方法時，所追蹤之動作嘗試回復的變更會反轉。When the method is invoked, the actions tracked by the are reversed to attempt to roll back the changes. 若要復原的先前交易的一部分時發生的動作，您必須使用開發環境所提供的 [復原] 命令。To undo actions that occurred as part of earlier transactions, you must use the undo command provided by the development environment. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例程式示範如何建立從設計工具。The following code example program demonstrates how to create a from a designer. 若要執行此範例中，將原始程式碼編譯為類別庫。To run this sample, compile the source code into a class library. 您必須加入 System.Design 組件的參考。You must add a reference to the System.Design assembly. 在新的專案中，將參考加入至已編譯的 DLL 和程式庫中加入元件**工具箱**。In a new project, add a reference to the compiled DLL and add the component in the library to the **Toolbox**. 沒有對 Visual Studio 中的這項功能有廣泛的支援。There is extensive support for this feature in Visual Studio. 另請參閱[逐步解說： 自動填入工具箱 「 自訂 」 元件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx)。Also see [Walkthrough: Automatically Populating the Toolbox with Custom Components](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fw694kde\(v=vs.110\).aspx). 在設計工具可以選擇性地顯示有關設計工具異動事件通知。The designer can optionally display notifications about designer transaction events. 如果您加入的執行個體`DTComponent`表單在設計模式中的訊息方塊出現，詢問您想要接收設計工具異動事件通知。If you add an instance of the `DTComponent` to a form while in design mode, a message box appears asking whether you would like to receive designer transaction event notifications. 您可以切換使用捷徑功能表的執行個體上按一下滑鼠右鍵時出現這些通知`DTComponent`。You may toggle these notifications using the shortcut menu that appears when you right-click an instance of the `DTComponent`. 當您變更使用 [屬性] 視窗的值時，會建立交易。Transactions are created when you change values using the Properties window. 您也可以讓設計工具，即可執行交易**執行範例交易**元件的捷徑功能表上。You can also have the designer perform a transaction by clicking **Perform Example Transaction** on the shortcut menu for the component. [!code-cpp[DesignerTransaction Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerTransaction Sample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DesignerTransaction Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerTransaction Sample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTransaction Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DesignerTransaction Sample/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設計工具交易被取消時，交易處理機制會嘗試回復已到目前為止在交易中的變更。When a designer transaction is canceled, the transaction processing mechanism attempts to roll back the changes that have been made so far in the transaction. 成功是每個作業類型，這類因素，是否與任何相關的程式碼狀態干擾其他作業，以及是否一連串預期的作業無法完成。Whether this succeeds is dependent upon such factors as the type of each operation, whether other operations interfered with any of the involved code's state, and whether a sequence of expected operations failed to complete.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

span.span: Commits this transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具的交易認可時，就會被視為交易，而不會追蹤進一步的變更。When a designer transaction is committed, the transaction is considered complete and does not track further changes. 一旦交易已認可，進一步呼叫此方法執行任何動作。Once a transaction has been committed, further calls to this method do nothing. 建立交易以確認交易會適當地關閉之後，務必呼叫這個方法。Always call this method after creating a transaction to ensure that the transaction closes properly.

Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 釋出與這個物件相關聯的資源。

span.span: Releases the resources associated with this object.

summary.span: 如果這個異動還沒有認可，則這個覆寫會認可該異動。

span.span: This override commits this transaction if it was not already committed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫並清除資源，藉由呼叫`Dispose(false)`。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 覆寫 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自訂清除。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
